summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO NYS) regarding the Epstein case, containing a subject referencing Epstein victims and an attached voice message audio file from August 7, 2019. The document appears to be internal correspondence forwarding potential evidence or a tip.

events.title: Voice Message Recorded
events.description: A voice message was recorded and later attached to an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The document is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO NYS) concerning the Epstein case.
The email subject references 'EpsteinVictims', indicating the communication pertains to victims of Jeffrey Epstein.
An audio file attachment named '20190807_133608.wav' containing a voice message was sent on August 7, 2019.
The email was sent on August 7, 2019, which was the day after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and the same day he was found injured in his jail cell.
The correspondence suggests the receipt or forwarding of potential evidence or a tip related to the investigation into Epstein and his victims.
